sentences.en: A shipping company has made a claim for the cost of salvaging a sunken ship.
sentences.cn: 某轮船公司要求赔赏打捞沉船的费用. (makeaclaim要求)

sentences.en: Her eyes were sunken after her illness.
sentences.cn: 她病了一场,眼睛都眍进去了.

sentences.en: Her eyes were sunken and black-ringed.
His eyes became sunken and even the scar on his face darkened.
sentences.cn: 他的眼陷下去,连脸上那块疤都有些发暗.

sentences.en: His sunken eyes glistened with delight.
sentences.cn: 他凹陷的眼睛闪现出喜悦的光芒。

sentences.en: If we can get some strong ropes or wires around the sunken boat, we might be able to haul it up.
sentences.cn: 如果能用一些结实的绳子或金属缆绳拴在沉船的周围, 或许我们能把它拖上来.

sentences.en: It is not uncommon to hear that a shipping company has made a claim for the cost of salvaging a sunken ship.
sentences.cn: 航运公司为打捞沉船的费用而提出要求,这并非奇闻.

sentences.en: She looked old and thin with sunken cheeks and hollow eyes.
sentences.cn: 她看上去又老又瘦,脸颊凹陷,眼圈发黑.

sentences.en: Steps lead down to the sunken garden.
The room was dominated by a sunken bath.
sentences.cn: 嵌入地面的浴缸占了房间的大半空间。

sentences.en: The sunken sailing-boat was a glimmer of white on the bottom.
sentences.cn: 沉没的帆船在海底闪烁着白光。

sentences.en: They looked pale and unhealthy, with unwashed hair and sunken cheeks.
sentences.cn: 他们脸色苍白，精神不振，头发脏乱，两颊深陷。

sentences.en: This sighting occurred during my dive to a sunken wreck off Sardinia.
sentences.cn: 这是我在撒丁岛附近的沉船残骸处潜水时所见的景象。
试着潜入水下找寻沉没的财宝。

sentences.en: We've putting a sunken bath in our bathroom.
sentences.cn: 我们在浴室里安装了一只埋入地面的浴缸.

words.tran_cn: 铅锤；铅坠；[矿业] 凿井工；下沉的人
下沉（sink的过去分词和过去式）

trans.tran_cn: 沉没的，凹陷的，下陷的，低于周围平面的，水底的，埋着的
trans.tran_en: having fallen to the bottom of the sea, a lake, or a river
